snippet: A new study based on research in western Australia suggests that warming seas can benefit corals -- but perhaps only to a point.
abstract: A new study based on research in western Australia suggests that warming seas can benefit corals -- but perhaps only to a point.
lead_paragraph: As many readers know, considerable fear surrounds the future of the world's coral reefs. Catastrophic declines have already occurred in some places, usually as a result of climate change combined with human activity like the dumping of sewage.

headline.main: Warming Seas and Corals: A New Conundrum
